name: Bugs And Fire
description:
Some evil wizard has warped our poor bug dude to a hazardous, fiery world. Help him with getting out alive!

Just a quick prototype platformer with some groovy marimba tune.
Originally made in less than 2 hours on December 16, 2020.
I might continue this thing.

Controls:

AD Walk
W Jump
R Restart stage
G Restart game
Esc Quit game
